translations.translation: In order to improve user experience at OVH, we have launched OVH UX LABS. The concept is very simple, and involves creating new ways of providing our services.
At OVH, customer support is a top priority. This is why we have sought out other methods of communicating how to use our services.

We want to know what you think of our progress and this is why we are offering you access to one of the projects we are currently working on. Please do not hesitate to provide your feedback to our mailing list
The OVH virtual assistant is a chatbot, i.e. artificial intelligence which can answer many support queries.
For example, instead of ringing support if your website has stopped working, you can ask the chatbot directly.
Currently, we provide two ways of interacting with the chatbot:
This first version of the tool allows you to perform a website diagnostic with your web hosting package and domain.
Here are the sort of questions which you can currently ask it:
How do I change my example.com DNS servers?
How do I point my example.ovh domain to my web hosting package?
